title: Twelue sermons of Saynt Augustine, now lately translated into English by Tho. Paynel
author: Augustine, Saint, Bishop of Hippo.
publicationStmtPublisher: In Powles church yarde at the sygne of the holye goost by Ihon Cawood, prynter to the Quenes Maiestie. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,
